import React from 'react'; import './NFT_Campaign.css'; import { Navbar, Container, Accordion } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Bike from '../../Assets/images/about/bike.png'; import Bike2 from '../../Assets/images/about/bike2.png'; const NFT_Campaign = props => { return ( <>
NFTs Campaign

Cotton NFT Metaverse Limited Collection Edition Campaign

We worked hard to relaunch Cotton The Motorcycle Masterpiece, and we are keen to build our community of first passionate future customers to help us launch the first one hundred unique Cotton Motorcycle models that we will start to produce after this NFT sale campaign.

During our NFT sale campaign, we will only mint ONE HUNDRED NFTs that represent authentic pieces of art and the design of the new physical model that you can order on our website only. We will start to produce the new model COTTON RUMBLE after the successful competition of the NFT sale campaign.

When you buy one of these NFTs, you will have the priority to order the new COTTON RUMBLE, claiming 50% off the corresponding cost of the NFT value on the next COTTON motorcycle purchased.

Join our NFT Sale Campaign

We Will Only Mint One Hundred NFTs

When you purchase our NFTs Cotton Metaverse Limited Collection Edition You can list and sell NFTs Cotton Metaverse Limited Collection Edition at any time or ask us to list them on our Solana's marketplace to receive bids and trade them.

We believe in a future built around superior experience, positive engagement, transparency, and inclusive economics to create a fairer system for all. We aim to revolutionize the motorcycle industry and keep up the physical world of motorcycles with the digital sphere in this unique place of Cotton Moto-Verse.

Join our NFT Sale Campaign

FAQ’s

What is an NFT ? NFTs are digital certificates that authenticate a claim of ownership to an asset, and allow it to be transferred or sold. The certificates are secured with blockchain technology. The key difference between NFTs and cryptocurrencies is that currencies allow fungible trade, which means anyone can create Bitcoins that can be exchanged for other Bitcoins. NFTs are by definition nonfungible, and are deployed as individual chains of ownership to track a specific asset. NFTs are designed to restrict and represent a unique claim on an asset uniquely. The NFTs that we sell are not utility tokens and they will never be listed in any digital Exchange or Decentralized Exchange but in marketplaces like any other digital good. If you buy, you purchase because you are keen to buy our design and digital goods. What is the Cotton’s NFT Metaverse Limited Collection Edition Campaign ? During our NFT sale campaign, we will only mint a limited number of NFTs that represent true pieces of art. By purchasing them, you get the priority to order the new physical model Cotton Rumble motorcycle at a discounted resale price. We will start to produce this model after that the campaign terminates. When you buy one of these NFTs, you will have the priority to order the new models, and you can claim 50% off the value of any NFT purchased to buy the new Cotton Motorcycle (The Rumble). During our Sale NFTs campaign, we will sell some NFTs on the Metaplex marketplace (SOLANA) and some of them on our marketplace (discounted). How Can I buy Cotton’s NFT Metaverse Limited Collection Edition ? You can buy our NFTs Metaverse Limited Collection Edition only on our website during our NFTs Sale campaign. To purchase our NFTs you can use credit cards or a Phantom wallet. If you use the Phantom wallet, please Visit https://phantom.app/download and select your browser type. Follow steps in your respective extension store to add Phantom to your browser. After installing, you should see Phantom start up in a new tab: What’s the benefits to buy Cotton’s NFT Metaverse Limited Collection Campaign ?

When you buy our NFTs you can get several benefits. Besides being a supporter of us you will purchase a unique digital piece of art tradable anytime whatever you like (on the Solana Blockchain).

When you buy our NFTs, you get the priority to order the new model of Cotton Rumble motorcycle, and you can claim 50% off the value of any NFT purchased to buy the new Cotton Rumble Motorcycle.

The NFT Metaverse Limited Cotton Collection Edition can be used in any Metaverse (e.g. Decentraland) because they are designed with a particular coding. You will have jut to ask the file and we will send it.

The NFT Metaverse Limited Cotton Collection Edition will be listed on Solana’s Cotton store and marketplace if you ask after you have purchased it.

How to list my NFT if I buy on your platform After purchasing any NFT by credit card, you can ask to list it on Solana’s Cotton store and its Marketplace to receive offers. When we receive an offer, we will update you to receive instructions to sell it. We will not get any commission for this service. Am I investing in the company ? When you purchase any NFT Metaverse Limited Collection Edition, you are not investing in any company shares; instead, you buy a piece of digital art (NFT) that’s a digital good. By purchasing our NFTs and participating to our ecosystem, you will earn the priority to order the new model Cotton Rumble Motorcycle and claim discounts and future benefits besides being able to trade it everywhere, of course.
); } export default NFT_Campaign;
